name: 3. VEGAN CASHEW TOFU WITH HOISIN SAUCE
preparation: Tofu. Dry the tofu, tear it up in small pieces. Mix avocado soy sanuce and cornstarch and cover the tofu with it. Then spread the tofu on a pin and put it in the oven at ? degrees. After 10 minutes, turn the pieces upside down, till they get golden and crispy.
Hoisin sauce. Put together in a small pin: hoisin sauce, rice vinegar, soy sauce or tamari (gluten free), cornstarch, water and mix it till they combine.

Mix together. Take a pin, add some oil, green onions (the white part) and garlic and heat till garlic get golden and crispy, and then add the tofu, then add the poisson sauce. Cook mid-heat till it’s glossy. then add some salted cashew. Add the green part of the green onions and sesame oil.
Rice. Cook some rice with broccoli and add all together.
